TextSection.Contents: A group of endogenous Cushing syndrome (CS) that may result from excess secretion of cortisol by either a unilateral and benign (adrenocortical adenoma) or malignant (adrenocortical carcinoma) adrenocortical tumor or nodular adrenocortical disease including Cushing syndrome due to bilateral macronodular adrenocortical disease (BMAD) isolated micronodular adrenocortical disease (i-MAD) and primary pigmented nodular adrenocortical disease (PPNAD; isolated or in Carney complex).
